homeHeader.title: From Risk Assessment to Regulatory Approval — Expert AML Compliance Services That Protect Your Business
homeHeader.description: Worried about hefty regulatory fines, licensing risks, or reputational damage as you expand into the UAE? Protect your business reputation and ensure 100% AML compliance with end-to-end Anti-Money Laundering and Counter-Financial Terrorism solutions tailored to the Emirates' stringent regulatory landscape. We empower you with robust IT infrastructures and proactive compliance programs to stay competitive.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What is Anti-Money Laundering (AML) compliance in the UAE?
items.answer: AML compliance involves numerous strategies, including risk assessments, health checks, and audits to ensure your business complies with the UAE’s evolving AML requirements.

items.question: Who is subject to the UAE’s AML compliance requirements?
items.answer: The UAE AML compliance regulations apply to all financial institutions and Designated Non-Financial Businesses and Professions (DNFBPs), including precious metals, coloured stones, and diamond dealers, real estate firms, and corporate service providers.

items.question: Can One Nexuz help me set up an in-house AML compliance infrastructure?
items.answer: Yes, our certified AML experts can assist you in creating and implementing an internal AML compliance infrastructure tailored to your unique industry needs.

items.question: Does my business have to undergo AML training under the UAE’s AML law?
items.answer: Yes, AML training is mandatory for all employees handling client onboarding, funds transfer, transaction processing, and compliance.

items.question: How often do I need to update my AML infrastructure?
items.answer: It’s best to audit, review, and update your AML compliance setup annually or whenever the UAE’s regulatory landscape undergoes significant changes.
